comments.content:
yesss, which font is? is that “Neophyte”?  
 [http://www.dafont.com/glitch.d53](http://web.archive.org/web/20091217170332/http:/www.dafont.com/glitch.d53 "http://www.dafont.com/glitch.d53")

It seems it, but the one on DaFont lacks a bold weight:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/font.php?file=y2k\_neophyte&page=1&nb\_ppp\_old=10&te...](http://web.archive.org/web/20091217170332/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=y2k_neophyte&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=alla+Fnac+Parlano+i+Prezzi&nb_ppp=10&psize=m&classt=alpha "http://www.dafont.com/font.php?file=y2k\_neophyte&page=1&nb\_ppp\_old=10&text=alla+Fnac+Parlano+i+Prezzi&nb\_ppp=10&psize=m&classt=alpha")
it seems there is no bold version
Oh there is for sure one. But not available to the public, because it is an exclusive font for fnac.
